mapper.insert: INSERT INTO white_score_change_record(serial_number, member_id, change_amount, deal_type, original_record_no, create_time) VALUES(#{serialNumber}, #{accountId}, #{changeAmount}, #{dealType}, #{originalRecordNo}, #{createTime})

INSERT INTO white_score_change_record(serial_number, member_id, change_amount, deal_type, original_record_no, create_time) VALUES
(#{changeRecord.serialNumber}, #{changeRecord.accountId}, #{changeRecord.changeAmount}, #{changeRecord.dealType}, #{changeRecord.originalRecordNo}, #{changeRecord.createTime})
